title: Eador Masters of The Broken World -PROPHET [EN/DE/PL/RU]
description:
Eador is a universe made of countless shards of land drifting in the Great Nothing. Each of the shards is a little world unto itself, with geography and denizens of its own. The power over the shards is bitterly contested by Masters, the immortal beings mortals believe to be gods. Take the role of the mighty Master and shape the destiny of Eador! It is in your power to deliver the world from ultimate destruction or to choke it with an iron fist of tyranny. Eador: Masters of the Broken World is a turn-based fantasy strategy game, where the decisions you make affect the world even deeper
than the battles you win.

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir

NOTE:
If you have played this game before and it doesnt launch with the language selected during the installation, go to DocumentsEador folder and delete the resource.lib file. 
Game version is v1.2.1
